summary: I took about 2 hours to make this, because other intros made me cringe so here you go! /\_/\
descriptionHtml:
The difference between this mod and others is the outro is now more satisfying instead of a sudden cut off or a release date, plus it was downloaded (live action footage) in 1080p and exported in 1080p. I used more 2016-2017 style effects to make the intro look genuine and not something someone just threw together in spare minutes I took 2 hours perfecting the visual effects and sound effects. Again the selling point for this mod is that the ending won't leave with what feels like a piece of toilet paper still stuck after wiping yourself. I will be making a shorter version that will make this not as long to go through every time.

it uses the live action footage (all of it... i think... ya... nvm it does)Â 

!Warning!
Watch the videos for comparison in versions note that the mod is in 1080p if the YouTube video quality is lower be aware that it is not below 720p ingame

Also BACKUP THE ORIGINAL FILE!!!!!! I AM NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY DAMAGE DONE TO YOUR GAME!!

Place in:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim\Data\Video
author: Skyrim4DERS
